item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

COSI'S!!!

So we have had a few minor issues with Cosi's in the past but they really want to get back into the good graces of the NHC. I worked my magic and specials are as follows:

1) Appetizers including Pizza slices, Fruit and Brie Platter, and Cocktail Sandwiches will be included for free. There will be enough for a party of 35 to 40 people with an emphasis on our Pizza.
2) Drink specials on Mojitos and Draft Beer. (unless your parties prefer other types of drinks like wine and Martinis then we'll run a special on that instead)
3) Flexible room setup. You tell me what works best. We can have tables for 30 to almost 40 people or we can leave it open for easier mingling.
4) I may be able to throw in some limited free parking for about 10 or 12 cars.

As the date gets closer, I will work on finding out exactly what are drink specials will be.

Please Please Please RSVP so we can tell Carlos (Manager of Cosi) if he should plan on more food.

As a reminder, please ask for individual tabs from your bartender/waiter for food and drink

Contact is Robyn-Allise 203-823-5302.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever!
item.name: 9/17 Monday HAPPY Hour at Cosi's!!
